H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H5251.def: = a distinctive object in the form of a flag or board attached to a stick, or a metal device or image fitted on the end of a pole; ► normally used to identify a particular group, or as a rallying point for soldiers in war; ≈ often used figuratively to denote an example, or a person or deity that one can rely on, or something that shows the way

H3582.def: = state in which humans are unaware of certain information

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H954.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H2865.def: = state in which the surface of the soil is broken into many pieces

H6091.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ► functioning as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H6828.def: = a mountain, identified with Jebel ʾel-Aqraʿ ◄ in northern Syria, ► known by the Canaanites as the mountain of the gods

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H7896.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H8047.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H6869.def: = a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H1347.def: = dense growth of shrubbery or small trees, habitat of animals

H3383.def: = river; ◄ flowing from Mount {L:Hermon<SDBH:חֶרְמֹון>} in a southerly direction through the {L:Sea of Galilee<SDBH:כִּנֶּרֶת>} into the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}

H386.def: = state of not being subject to change

H7280.def: literally: until I will wink; hence: = state in which an event lasts for a very short length of time

H7323.def: = action by which humans walk at a relatively high speed

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H977.def: = action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H3644.def: = fire; ≈ associated with God's punishment, which is too heavy for humans to bear

H3259.def: = process by which an object is placed in a certain location or in a certain posture

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3289.def: = action by which humans or deities exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H4284.def: = procedure for achieving a certain purpose, originating from someone's לֵב mind

H2803.def: = action by which humans exercise their {L:mind<SDBH:לֵב>} with regard to something

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3778.def: exact meaning unknown; = class of persons skilled in magic and soothsaying; ◄ found in {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>}

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H6810.def: literally: small; hence: = state in which humans are considered unworthy of honor and respect

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H5498.def: = causative action by which humans or animals move relatively heavy objects by pulling them over the ground

H8074.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H2201.def: = action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
